metadata.title: CVE-2017-5456 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A mechanism to bypass file system access protections in the sandbox usingthe file system request constructor through an IPC message. This allows forread and write access to the local file system. This vulnerability affectsFirefox ESR < 52.1 and Firefox < 53.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5456` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
